column5: Unique 4BDR/2BA lake lodge nestled in a quiet neighborhood on the land between the lakes. Just 2 blocks from the last free public boat ramp on the Beautiful Lake Austin and the world renowned Lake Austin Spa, and just a few short miles from Mansfield Dam Park boat ramp on Lake Travis.    Wake up to stunning views of the mountain ridge and step out on our multi-level, large outdoor decks with multiple seating areas that are perfect to enjoy your morning coffee or a BBQ dinner.
column8: Lakeland Lodge, Best of Boat Worlds
